SpermRace.random(uint256) (contracts/SpermRace.sol#191-193) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(tx.origin,blockhash(uint256)(block.number - 1),block.timestamp,seed))) (contracts/SpermRace.sol#192)
